image_1.description: A residential area with houses and streets submerged in water due to Hurricane Ian, making it difficult for vehicles to pass through. The water has reached the rooftops of some houses and is covering the roads.

Multiple houses in Florida are visible, some of which have white roofs and others with different colors. The houses are surrounded by water, indicating a severe flood situation caused by Hurricane Ian.
Several trees are scattered throughout the neighborhood in Florida. Some trees are partially submerged in water due to the flooding caused by Hurricane Ian, while others are standing tall.
A vehicle is seen driving through the flooded streets of Florida, creating waves behind it. The vehicle appears to be navigating through the water caused by Hurricane Ian.

image_2.description: A living room with furniture covered in debris and water damage, likely a result of Hurricane Ian's destruction in Florida.
Several boats damaged and scattered in a marina, with debris surrounding them, possibly due to Hurricane Ian's impact in Florida.
An elderly woman with white hair, wearing a floral top and black pants, standing in a damaged living room, possibly a victim of Hurricane Ian's destruction.
A man with glasses, wearing a green hoodie and red shorts, standing next to the elderly woman in a damaged living room, possibly affected by Hurricane Ian.
